text_block_list.text: I had promised Maruzensky to accompany her for horseshoe shopping, but our meeting time came, and there was no sign of her…
I couldn't reach her phone, so I decided to check up on her at her place.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I-I'll be right there…! Oh dear, is that another package? I'm sorry, give me a min—… uaaaaah!?
I heard a loud noise accompanied by Maruzensky's scream, and instinctively opened the door.
… There, buried in cardboard, laid Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Sorry for startling you earlier.
choice_data_list: Why was there a mountain of cardboard…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You know how when you order online, it arrives in cardboard boxes? And, umm… they don't disappear on their own?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You know…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Ugh! Fine, I haven't gotten around to cleaning up! It was all packages you saw…!
choice_data_list: I take it tidying up isn't your forte?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ummm… how do I put it.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I can get all stoked for it when I have guests over, you know? Then I'm cleaning every nook and cranny.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But when I'm alone, I just can't get in the groove…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: This morning I dropped my cell somewhere on cardboard mountain, and I was looking for it when you came over…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: This morning I dropped my cell somewhere on cardboard mountain, and I was looking for it when you came over…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I can't believe you saw that mess on top of me being late. Haa, I should keep the place tidy…
choice_data_list: I'll help you tidy it up.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wha!? My place? Are you sure?
choice_data_list: It's more fun with two, right?
It's more fun with two, right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Yeah. If you're down with it, then I'm down with it!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Yeah. If you're down with it, then let's jive!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thankies♪ Let's go, trainer!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thankies♪ Let's go, trainer!
We went back to her place and for a few hours, packages were sorted and cardboard put in piles.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thanks, trainer! It's so much nicer now!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thanks, trainer! It's so much more refreshing now!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'll treat you to whatever you want in return. Don't be shy♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: In fact, why don't I make you something myself? This morning aside, I can whip up a mean plate!
choice_data_list: So cooking you do feel like?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Mmm～ about as much as I clean. It's hard to feel like it when I'm alone, same thing.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But today, you're here! So what would you like? Eastern, Western, just say the word♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But today, you're here! So what would you like? Eastern, Western, just say the word♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm going to go all out, look forward to it!
Having gone out of her way to even buy new seasonings, Maruzensky started on dinner. She wasn't kidding about her cooking skills, and one by one dishes appeared—
Neither presentation nor taste would be out of place in a restaurant!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Whoo! That was great. What did you think, are you satisfied?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Whoo! That was great. What did you think, are you satisfied?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, great♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You helped me out so much today and I'm still regretting this morning, so I wanted to make it up to you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You helped me out so much today and I'm still ashamed of this morning, so I wanted to make it up to you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm so relieved you liked it! Now I just need to—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … make sure that those packages don't become a problem again.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But that's the hard part, isn't it～? How do I get motivated to tidy up?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I don't mind it, but I can't bring myself to just do it like I can running or dancing.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Oh! How about you drop by to check on me once in a while? Wouldn't that work?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Oh! How about you drop by to check on me once in a while? Wouldn't that work?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Really? Then in return… I'll treat you to home-cooked meals♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You dropping by, and cooking for you means…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You dropping by, and cooking for you means…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I can keep my place neat, and we can enjoy meals together!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm so happy. Motivation aside, eating alone is so dull I couldn't enjoy the taste!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Problems solved and fun times ahead! Thanks, trainer♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Problems solved and fun times ahead! Thanks, trainer♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, it's about time to go home.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … We tidied up together and ate dinner together.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: It doesn't sound like much but I really enjoyed our time. I already can't wait to do it again!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hmhm. I really shouldn't be happy for someone to come checking my place for clutter.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … I know! Why don't you just move in next door? You wouldn't have to go back and forth to drop by… Cool?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm pretty sure the room next door is vacant right now, I'll go check it out!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Aww, boo♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Hehe. Oh you're so cute getting all flustered, trainer!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Hehe. Oh you're so cute getting all flustered, trainer!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well anyway… I'd be happy for you to drop by whenever.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Even every day… ♪
With a mischievous smile, Maruzensky got into her beloved car and drove off…
